page.title: 15 FAMILIES IN WADSLEY
page.content: MOST PEOPLE IN WADSLEY HAVE CHILDREN.SOME HAVE PETS FOR INSTANCE ONE LADY HAS A HORSE,A CAT AND FIVE RABBITS.ALL PEOPLE IN WADSLEY HAVE LIVED IN THEIR HOUSES FROM THREE WEEKS UP TO FORTY SEVEN YEARS OR MORE. PEOPLE HAVE DIFFERENT{ATTITUDES TOWARDS WADSLEY.SOME PEOPLE LIKE IT BECAUSE OF THE COUNTRYSIDE AND THE LOCAL SHOPS BUT OTHERS DISLIKE THE AREA BECAUSE OF THE HILLS AND STEPS. TWO PEOPLE SAID THAT THE SHEFFIELD RATES ARE TOO HIGH. THE LOCAL FOOTBALL GROUND (SHEFFIELD WEDNESDAY)PROVIDES{RECREATION}FOR SOME PEOPLE BUT NOT FOR OTHERS. PEOPLE BELIEVE THEIR{LIFE STYLES ARE BUSY OR DULL.{HOME LIFE}IS DIFFERENT FOR DIFFERENT FAMILIES.
